developer=[[CHAOS Productions]]<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/chaos1.html Lord of the Rings vol. 1] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 26 March 2011)</ref><ref name="介">[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 26 March 2011)</ref>

column1: '''Lord of the Rings vol. 1''' (French: ''Seigneur de la Bague vol. 1'') is a video game written by Vector.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="介"/><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=CON&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=7 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 8 (retrieved 26 March 2011)</ref> It's a mix of a puzzle-game and RPG.<ref name="El Anillo"/> The French version won the first prize for the computer game category in the The Mississippi Foreign Language Fair.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> It was later followed by ''[[Lord of the Rings vol. 2]]''.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/>
